alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Meigs; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:36PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rhea, northeastern Bledsoe, northeastern Meigs and southwestern Roane Counties through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 736 PM EDT/636 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring City, or 14 miles northwest of Decatur, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockwood, Spring City, Peakland, Stinging Fork Falls State Park, Eagle Furnace, Piney Falls State Park, Grandview and Melvine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
